com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener

Class ResizeListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.ui.listener.ResizeListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResizeCanvasListener, ResizeSidebarListener

     class ResizeListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener
    This Listener forces a certain size for its source component.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ResizeListener(java.awt.Dimension minSize)
      Create a new listener that only allows resizing larger than a minimum size.
